#summary Description of milestone D2 for Flax 1.0

= D2: Web Server =

For this milestone we will develop a web server that serves the pages
generated from the templates developed in [D1]. Administrator pages
and functionality will protected by HTTP authentication.

We will use one of twisted.web, twisted.web2, nevow or CherryPy for
the basic web serving functionaly. (This needs to be nailed down).

The web server will contain stubbs for funcationalty to be written as
part of other milestones.
